title: Power of a Product Rule
text: For any real numbers a and $$b$$ and any integer $$n$$, the power of a product rule of exponents states that $${ab}^n=a^n b^n$$
speech: For any real numbers a and  b  and any integer  n , the power of a product rule of exponents states that  a b to the n-th is equal to, a to the n-th b to the n-th
pacedSpeech: For any real numbers a and   b
, the power of a product rule of exponents states that   a b to the n-th is equal to, a to the n-th b to the n-th

title: Power of a Product Rule
text: Use the power of a product rule to simplify the expression: $${\left(2t\right)}^{15}=2^{15} t^{15}$$
speech: Use the power of a product rule to simplify the expression:  parentheses 2 t  to the fifteenth is equal to, 2 to the fifteenth t to the fifteenth
pacedSpeech: Use the power of a product rule to simplify the expression:    2 t  to the fifteenth is equal to, 2 to the fifteenth t to the fifteenth
